description: This source file defines functions for generating C++ code related to JSON-RPC event and method emission, registration, deregistration, and versioning. It contains code that handles serialization, deserialization, and registration of RPC methods and events in a plugin architecture.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates C++ code for emitting a specific JSON-RPC event, including the function signature, parameter handling, and notification logic.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates the code that appears at the beginning of the RPC source file, including headers, namespace declarations, and initial setup.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Generates the closing code for the RPC source file, including namespace closures.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Emits C++ namespace code that contains version constants for the RPC.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main function that emits the complete RPC code, orchestrating prologue, core implementation, and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: High-level function to generate the full RPC source code, including the whole setup.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Emit only the version-related code of the RPC definitions.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
